description: LeaderElection provides information to elect a leader

disable.description: disable allows leader election to be suspended while allowing a fully defaulted "normal" startup case.

leaseDuration.description: Duration is a wrapper around time.Duration which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON. In particular, it marshals into strings, which can be used as map keys in json.

name.description: name indicates what name to use for the resource

namespace.description: namespace indicates which namespace the resource is in

renewDeadline.description: Duration is a wrapper around time.Duration which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON. In particular, it marshals into strings, which can be used as map keys in json.

retryPeriod.description: Duration is a wrapper around time.Duration which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON. In particular, it marshals into strings, which can be used as map keys in json.
